issue.message: A newer version of androidx.activity:activity-ktx than 1.1.0 is available: 1.2.0
A newer version of androidx.databinding:databinding-common than 4.1.1 is available: 4.1.2
A newer version of androidx.hilt:hilt-compiler than 1.0.0-alpha02 is available: 1.0.0-alpha03
A newer version of androidx.hilt:hilt-lifecycle-viewmodel than 1.0.0-alpha02 is available: 1.0.0-alpha03
A newer version of androidx.navigation:navigation-fragment-ktx than 2.3.2 is available: 2.3.3
A newer version of androidx.navigation:navigation-ui-ktx than 2.3.2 is available: 2.3.3
A newer version of com.android.tools.build:gradle than 4.1.1 is available: 4.1.2
A newer version of com.google.android.material:material than 1.2.1 is available: 1.3.0
A newer version of junit:junit than 4.13.1 is available: 4.13.2
Use the Lifecycle Java 8 API provided by the `lifecycle-common-java8` library instead of Lifecycle annotations for faster incremental build.
This field leaks a context object
The resource `R.color.colorProgressBg` appears to be unused
Do not concatenate text displayed with `setText`. Use resource string with placeholders.
String literal in `setText` can not be translated. Use Android resources instead.
